column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////It even held up through the night to the next morning WITHOUT REFRIGERATION!  OK
column2: clearly I don't recommend this on your normal dining experience
column3: but we didn't have a viable fridge in our schwanky hotel
column4: so kept it in the ice bucket for a wee little bit
column5: then left it in the box till morning; and lo and behold
column6: it was a delicious breakfast!  Who would have thought!
